ghost

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(processing.core.PImage mapDownLeft, processing.core.PImage mapDownRight, processing.core.PImage mapFruit, processing.core.PImage mapHorizontal, processing.core.PImage mapUpLeft, processing.core.PImage mapUpRight, processing.core.PImage mapVertical, processing.core.PImage mapSuperFruit, processing.core.PImage mapSoda)
      Store map layout in form of character, map layout in form of Entities object, all image of map object, all images of every type of fruits and number of ghost of each type.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(processing.core.PImage mapDownLeft,
           processing.core.PImage mapDownRight,
           processing.core.PImage mapFruit,
           processing.core.PImage mapHorizontal,
           processing.core.PImage mapUpLeft,
           processing.core.PImage mapUpRight,
           processing.core.PImage mapVertical,
           processing.core.PImage mapSuperFruit,
           processing.core.PImage mapSoda)
        Store map layout in form of character, map layout in form of Entities object, all image of map object, all images of every type of fruits and number of ghost of each type.
        Parameters:
        mapDownLeft - Image of corner down left of the map.
        mapUpLeft - Image of corner up left of the map.
        mapUpRight - Image of corner up right of the map.
        mapDownRight - Image of corner down right of the map.
        mapVertical - Image of vertical map.
        mapHorizontal - Image of horizontal map.
        mapFruit - Image of fruit.
        mapSuperFruit - Image of superFruit.
        mapSoda - Image of soda.

      • parseMapToChar

        public void parseMapToChar(JsonParser parsed)
        Take filename from the config object, than read the file and convert them into a map layout in form of two dimensional character array. Set the two dimensional array of type character to instance variable name mapLayOut.
        Parameters:
        parsed - JsonParser Object.

      • mapCharToObject

        public void mapCharToObject()
        Take two dimensional character array that represent the map stored in instance variable and convert them into a map layout in form of two dimensional Entities Object array. Count number of ghost for each type of ghost (Ambusher, Chaser, Ignorant, Whim).

        Set the two dimensional array of type Entities Object (Contain only fruit, superfruit and wall) to instance variable name mapLayOutObj.

      • draw

        public void draw(App app)
        Draw the map using the two dimensional array that contain Entities object: get the image from each object, Xcoordinate of the object and Ycoordinate of the object.

        If the image of the object null, continue.

        Parameters:
        app - PApplet Object
